name: Dancing dice
description:
You're a space ship fighting against dancing dices. You can get rid of them only when they are green.

 You move with WASD and shoot with spacebar.

 WARNING: CONTAINS FLASHES, might trigger seizures.

This game was made in pure Javascript using canvas and a WebGL shader (inspired from PICO-8) was used to give it a retro look.

Team:

Andrei, eleven yeas old, made graphics, code, gameplay and music.

His dad helped him with the shader
